body:
So recently I started to build my own PC, and I'm currently at the stage where I have to install the Operating System. I'm wondering which version of Windows is better for gaming: 7 or 8.

I searched all over the internet to see which one is better, but all I got was mixed reviews. So please, you people that have built many many PC's out there, tell me which is better.

When you do tell me which one is better, please tell me what version of those two is best for gaming.
ex. Windows 7 Home Premium
or
Windows 8.1
Something like that

replies.body: I'm currently a Mac user but I've had quite a bit of experience with both OS before. I'd choose Windows 8 simply because I like its design and flow better; you can multitask while you game (like watching a video or playing music) but other than that, no huge difference. Go with what you feel best.

I vote for windows 8.
It gets a lot of hate because it's got a new layout, but once you're at your desktop, it isn't really too much different to windows 7.
